I was apart of the team that transform talktalk main site (an AngularJS application), mainly on sales places but contentful was used on Myaccount pages, from using JSON files to a headless CMS named Contentful. The aim was to decrease the time to edit content and remove the need for developers to perform those changes.


Summary of the project is as followed:

  • Written and developing components to better handled to modelize site, including written both unit and e2e tests when needed.
  • Create content models to handles pages and each component.
  • Slowly removing old page structure and replace with Contentful page.
  • Additional tools was created to bulk publish and copy content to allow edited greated ease to release and create new content for the site.
